Class Word

java.lang.Object

public class Word
extends java.lang.Object

The basic word class TODO - Create word comparator and internationalization. That is: If the word is in French and we need to know if it is a conjunction we need something like: Jaque et Pierre == John and Peter Word.compare(english("and"));
